measurements_data.source: ITU (International Telecommunication Union). 2015. "Sustainable Waste Management of Electrical and Electronic Devices in Latin America" ["Gestión Sostenible de Residuos de Aparatos Eléctricos y Electrónicos en América Latina"]. ITU, Basel Convention, CRBAS-Basel Regional Center for South America, UNESCO, WHO, UNIDO, WIPO, ECLAC 2015 [UIT, Convenio de Basilea, CRBAS-Centro Regional Basilea para América del Sur, UNESCO, OMS, ONUDI, OMPI, CEPAL 2015]. May.
